name: KCSP Teaching School
trainWithUs:
KCSP is a Multi Academy Catholic Trust whose core purpose is to be academes of outstanding learning and where the Catholic faith is taught and nurtured. Our desire is that all pupils and staff are given the opportunity to grow in confidence and maximise their potential. Our inclusive values offer such development for all our trainee teachers.
Our teacher training offer is supported by all 24 schools in our MAT. There are 19 primary schools and 5 secondary schools the vast majority of which are rated either Good or Outstanding. St Margaret Clitherow is the lead school for the School Direct offer, both salaried and unsalaried, from where we have supported all the other academies in our trust for the last 4 years to ensure excellent training towards QTS and we welcome applications from all.
trainWithDisability: As a Multi Academy Trust of 24 schools we are able to offer placements which accommodate all additional needs.
